booking: To book, please download the app
servicessubhead: We offer a wide variety of services
humantext: People are at the heart of our business.
respecttext: Respect for customers and service providers is important to maintain good harmony and a good working atmosphere.
qualitytext: The quality of work is not an option, it is an obligation for us.
satisfactiontext: The satisfaction of our customers is our priority. We implement our algorithms to offer our customers profiles that correspond to their searches. We ask customers to give us their opinions on the services in order to continually improve them.
transparencytext: We are transparent about the prices and fees charged, with our customers and also with our service providers.
trusttext: The trust of our customers is precious and we aim to keep it. We support our customers and service providers before, during and after each service. We ensure that our service providers work in good conditions.
qualitypara: The quality of work is not an option, for us it is an obligation. The providers present on our platform have been checked, interviewed and trained
contactssubhead: Are you ready for better services?
name: Name
about: Trankyl is the only application for your works and services in Togo: household, Repair, Carpentry, Courses, Beauty, Hairdressing and others.
abouttext1: I am Sati SAI, the founder of Trankyl.
abouttext2: The idea for the Trankyl project came to me when I was looking around:
abouttextli1: I had relatives who were asking me to help them find work
abouttextli2: I also saw my parents and friends who had difficulties finding people they trusted to help them with their work at home without it costing them an arm and a leg.
abouttext3: I thought there should be a way to connect these two parts, a way to meet each other's needs...
abouttext4: After a lot of work, motivation and grace, the first version of the Trankyl application was born in March 2021. I thank all the people who contributed to it and who are part of this adventure.
